meanings.definition: relating to the scientific study of insects
meanings.sent1: The entomological research paper discussed various insect species.
meanings.sent2: She attended an entomological conference to learn more about bugs.
meanings.sent3: The entomological expert joked that studying bugs was 'ant'-ertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her entomological knowledge spread through the scientific community like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The entomological field trip allowed students to observe insects up close.

meanings.sent1: The entomological society organized a bug-themed event.
meanings.sent2: His entomological collection of insects was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The entomological enthusiast proudly displayed his bug specimens.
meanings.sent4: In her entomological studies, she discovered new insect behaviors.
meanings.sent5: The entomological textbook provided detailed information about bugs.
